error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'total_caps' (value: 125) was used instead of 'green_caps' (value: 75).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 100
He has 75 green caps because 125 - 50 = <<125-50=75>>75
The proportion of caps that are green is 1 because 125 / 125 = <<125/125=1>>1
The percentage that are green is 100 because 1 x 100% = <<100=100>>100%
